message: Let's start fair! I propose a 50/50 split.
My turn! How about a 60/40 split in my favor?  This round is your best chance to get a decent share.
Okay, I'll offer you a 55/45 split, but this is my final offer. If you reject this, you'll get nothing in the next round.
It's my turn now, and time is running out for you! I'll take $99, and you can have $1. Don't forget, this is your last chance to get anything!
